lib.ui.panels.base

Class Panel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • lib.ui.panels.base.Panel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LabelPanel, MultipleLabelPanel, MultipleMethodsPanel, MultiplePADPanel, MultipleValuePanel, PADPanel, RadarPanel, StatePanel, ValuePanel

    public abstract class Panel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    Basic type for all panels used by the visualiser.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
